data.name: Longshot
data.description: Longshot is a genetically engineered hero from the Mojoverse, where he uses his luck powers to deal critical hits and become a hit with critics.

starItems.name: Longshot
starItems.description: Longshot is a genetically engineered hero from the Mojoverse, where he uses his luck powers to deal critical hits and become a hit with critics.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all attacks
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

3.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

4.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

5.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Always apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

6.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

7.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Damage is increased by an amount equal to this character's total Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Damage is increased by an amount equal to this character's total Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Damage is increased by an amount equal to this character's total Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be blocked.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
This attack has <color=#86e619>30%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Damage is increased by an amount equal to this character's total Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.
This attack has <color=#86e619>30%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Damage is increased by an amount equal to this character's total Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be blocked.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.
This attack has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Damage is increased by an amount equal to this character's total Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be blocked.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>550%</color> damage.
This attack has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Damage is increased by an amount equal to this character's total Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description: On self or ally Crit, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance

2.description:
On self or ally Crit, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.

Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

3.description:
On self or ally Crit, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.

Gain <color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance

4.description:
On self or ally Crit, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.

Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
On self or ally Crit, fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, lower Armor by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for all enemies

5.description:
On self or ally Crit, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, lower Armor by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for all enemies.

item.name: Gold
